spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Simple-Wiki
spec_data.Description:
The Pod::Simple::Wiki module is used for converting Pod text to Wiki text.
It currently contains the following output filters: Confluence, Kwiki,
Mediawiki, Moinmoin, Template, Tiddlywiki, Twiki and Usemod.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:20:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Utility and perl classes for converting POD to Wiki text
